props.name: text
props.description: Text for the button or link. If content is provided in the default slot, or if `element` is set to `input`, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: name
props.description: Name for the `input` or `button`. This has no effect if `element` is `a`.

props.name: type
props.description: Type of `input` or `button` - `button`, `submit` or `reset`. This has no effect if `component` is not `input` or `button`.

props.name: value
props.description: Value for the `button` tag. This has no effect if `element` is not `button`

props.name: disabled
props.description:
Whether the button should be disabled. If `element` is `input` or `button`, `disabled` and `aria-disabled`
attributes will be set automatically.

props.name: href
props.description: The URL that the button should link to. If this is set, `element` will be automatically set to `a` if it has not already been defined.

props.name: isStartButton
props.description: Use for the main call to action on your service's start page.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used to render the button, for example `RouterLink`. Will default to `a` if an `href` is provided or `button` otherwise.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the button. If content is provided in this slot, the `text` prop will be ignored.
